DOC.criteria: Healthy woman > 18 year old , one healthy fetus schedule elective caesarean section spinal anesthesia , read sign informed consent Known intolerability oxycodone . Previous use opioids . Hight < 150 cm , preconceptual BMI > 35 . ASA > 2 .
